name: Water Compression
the-point: Water is actually slightly compressible, otherwise sea levels would be 130 feet higher.

name: The Periodic Table
the-point: The letter 'J' is the only letter that does not appear on the Periodic Table.

name: Helium Shortage
the-point: Helium is the only element on Earth that is completely non-renewable; once it leaks into space, it's gone.

name: Glass Flow
the-point: Glass is not a slow-moving liquid; it is an amorphous solid.

name: Absolute Zero
the-point: At Absolute Zero, all molecular motion stops entirely.

name: DNA Storage
the-point: One gram of DNA can store up to 215 petabytes of digital data.

name: Banana Radiation
the-point: Bananas are slightly radioactive because they contain potassium.

name: The Speed of Sound
the-point: Sound travels about 4 times faster in water than it does in air.

name: Venus Rain
the-point: On Venus, it rains sulfuric acid, but it evaporates before it ever hits the ground.

name: Solid Oxygen
the-point: At very high pressure, oxygen turns into a solid that is blue and magnetic.

name: The Golden Ratio
the-point: The number 1.618 appears repeatedly in nature, from seashells to galaxies.

name: Hydrophobic Surfaces
the-point: Some materials are so water-repellent that water droplets will bounce off them like balls.

name: Quantum Entanglement
the-point: Two particles can be linked so that what happens to one affects the other instantly, even across the universe.

name: Crying in Space
the-point: In space, your tears don't fall; they stay on your eye as a big, painful ball of water.

name: Earthâ€™s Core
the-point: The Earth's inner core is as hot as the surface of the Sun.

name: Bioluminescence
the-point: Some animals create light through a chemical reaction that is 100% efficient (no heat lost).

name: Carbon Isotopes
the-point: Carbon-14 dating only works for objects up to 50,000 years old.

name: Superconductors
the-point: Some materials can conduct electricity with zero resistance if they are cold enough.

name: The Mpemba Effect
the-point: Under certain conditions, hot water can actually freeze faster than cold water.

name: Human Weight
the-point: If you removed all the empty space from the atoms that make up every human on Earth, we would fit inside an apple.

name: Enzymes
the-point: Without enzymes, the chemical reactions in your body would take millions of years to happen.

name: Lava Speed
the-point: Most lava flows move slower than a person can walk, but the gas clouds move at 400mph.

name: Hydrogen
the-point: Hydrogen is the most abundant element, making up 75% of the entire universe.

name: Color Perception
the-point: Magenta isn't on the light spectrum; our brain invents it to bridge the gap between red and violet.

name: The Higgs Boson
the-point: The 'God Particle' is what gives everything else in the universe its mass.
